Sentencas: The polarization behavior of (La0.8Sr0.2)(0.9)MnO3 (LSM) electrodes in contact with different chromia-forming alloys including a Ni-Cr-based superalloy (R600), and ferritic stainless steels (RA446 and Crofer22 APU) was studied under solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating conditions.
Titulo: An electrochemical method to assess the chromium volatility of chromia-forming metallic interconnect for SOFCs

Sentencas: The magnitude of the polarization potential increase, Delta E, depended on the composition and microstructure of the oxide scale formed on the alloy surface.
Titulo: An electrochemical method to assess the chromium volatility of chromia-forming metallic interconnect for SOFCs

Sentencas: Crofer22 APU alloy showed the lowest Delta E change as a function of the cathodic polarization time among the chromia-forming alloys studied.
Titulo: An electrochemical method to assess the chromium volatility of chromia-forming metallic interconnect for SOFCs

Sentencas: This is most likely due to the formation of the dense and void-free oxide scale and the (Cr, Mn)(3)O-4 spinel phase formed in the top layer of the oxide scale decreases the chromium volatility of the scale.
Titulo: An electrochemical method to assess the chromium volatility of chromia-forming metallic interconnect for SOFCs

Sentencas: The result demonstrates the feasibility of the electrochemical polarization method in the qualitative diagnosis of the Cr volatility of chromia-forming alloys as interconnect for SOFC applications.
Titulo: An electrochemical method to assess the chromium volatility of chromia-forming metallic interconnect for SOFCs
An electrochemical method to assess the chromium volatility of chromia-forming metallic interconnect for SOFCs
